description: This meatloaf is as pungent and zesty as a meatball, but baked in that iconic, sliceable loaf form A combination of chilies and sage add a spicy, earthy note, and a glaze of tomato paste and olive oil elevates a traditional dish away from its ketchup roots The pine nuts are a visual cue: this is something a little different
title: Spicy, Garlicky Meatloaf
title_page: Spicy, Garlicky Meatloaf Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This meatloaf is as pungent and zesty as a meatball, but baked in that iconic, sliceable loaf form. A combination of chilies and sage add a spicy, earthy note, and a glaze of tomato paste and olive oil elevates a traditional dish away from its ketchup roots. The pine nuts are a visual cue: this is something a little different. And it tastes great the day after.
Featured in: When Meatloaf Needs A Jolt.
